ygData.subject: Re: Kerra ridge was... Infected Paw
ygData.msgSnippet: I spent some time in Kerra Ridge in my teens, it was fun if a bit trainy (is that a word?).  It could use a make over and and some itemization as well. Also I
ygData.messageBody:
I spent some time in Kerra Ridge in my teens, it was fun if a bit trainy (is
that a word?). It could use a make over and and some itemization as well.
Also I heard that The Hole is supposed to be a level 15-30 zone.

Rokenn


>From: "CYR, Thierry" <tcyr@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] Kerra ridge was... Infected Paw
>Date: Tue, 16 Nov 1999 13:43:29 -0700
>
>i agree kerra ridge has so much potential, but its just horrible, that zone
>is just hilarious, some of my friends wanted a paw (damn druids) and while
>we were bored waiting for her to spawn, we would cause trains, just to
>myself i looted 31 catpeople, and think about this, we're not aggro to
>them,
>but think about a level 18 group trying to reach mitty. They'd get their
>butts kicked so bad. You pull one cat at lower level and the whole place
>comes. They need to fix aggro range or pathing or linkage or whatever it
>is, this zone is just horrible right now, and yet its a very cool zone
>
>Minkin
>sol ro
>Level 36 questing fool
>
>P.S. Anyone on Sol Ro willing to trade a hero bracer for lambent boots or
>gloves? i cant use the bracer as im a wood elf
>
